# May 24, 2019

## Process Engineer                              

**Detroit, MI, US**

We are currently seeking an exceptonal hard working individual to carry out process related tasks at our Detroit headquarters.

**Job Responsibilities**

* Experience in process engineering
* Invent, develop and implement challengin solutions
* Prioritise industry sectors, understand OEM's needs (Automotive & non Automtive markets)
* Create technical solutions to overcome process challenges
* Assist engineering team to reach a complete conclusion.

**Job Requirements**

* Knowledge of process materials, polymers and polymer foams at teh least.
* Undertanding of or ability to quickly learn process technolgies in terms of performance, investement, cycle times and cost.
* Ability to manage project timeline, responsibilities and sign off final processes.
* CAD literate
* Comfortable with FEA

## March 28, 2019

## Innovation Manager

**Innovation Centre - Location TBC**

We are currently seeking an innovation manager to work for us in our brand new exciting Innovation Centre.

**Job Responsibilities**

* Secure ARPRO sales through early involvement in the development of innovative solutions
* Invent, develop and implement challenging ARPRO solutions, from initial concept to start-of-production
* Prioritise industry sectors, understand OEM’s needs (Automotive & Non-Automotive markets)
* Create technical content and evaluate TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) to sell novel concepts to relevant stakeholders
* Assist Sales in providing material and application specific expertise to optimise overall system performance

**Job Requirements**

* Knowledge of polymers, polymer foams or at least some understanding and the ability to improve knowledge in these topics quickly. 
* Understanding of or ability to quickly learn assembly technologies, in terms of performance, investment, cycle times and cost
* Ability to manage innovation projects: time-line, responsibilities, process and customer sign-off
* Interest in: automotive, HVAC or any technical, innovative subject area
* CAD literate
* Comfortable with FEA
* Prepared to challenge conventional system lay-out and thinking
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills 
* Proficient in English and good conversational German
* Willingness to travel throughout EMEA (50% of your time)
* High degree of autonomy

_Interested or you know someone? Please send your CV and cover letter in English to Iris.Ogiejko@jsp.com before 12.06.2019._

![](/images/uploads/easyapply_med.png)

## June 1, 2019

# Process Manager

## Location Europe. City to be decided

**Job Responsibilities**

* Manage the EMEA team, apply exemplary and honest leadership in line with our strategy and our values, including ONE JSP.
* Develop and implement sustainable production processes and technology to decrease CoP; optimise recycling (utilities and material) and minimise environmental impacts.
* Ensure efficient process (product availability at exemplary quality and consistency).
* Ensure safe and secured processes in Cheb and Estrées with equivalent operating procedures.
* Provide and use tools, techniques and share knowledge to ease the operations. Analyse performance, report, drive continuous improvements.

**Job Requirements**

* Good knowledge in ARPRO processing 
* Knowledge’s in polymers processing (extrusion, injection molding, foaming)
* The ability to lead and motivate a team and spread ONE JSP
* The ability to eliminate complexity, to be clear and brief
* Flexibility, self-confidence, persistence and initiative 
* Excellent planning, organisational and analytical skills 
* The ability to work on EMEA projects (cross functional)

_Fluent in English_

Willingness to travel in Europe

_Interested or you know someone? Please send your CV and cover letter in English to cassandre.jardin@jsp.com no later than 05.06.2019_

![](/images/uploads/easyapply_med.png)

## May 13, 2019

# Shift leader

## Location: Estrees St Denis, France

**Job Responsibilities**

_The mission of the Shift Leader will be:_

* Exemplary strong, dynamic, honest leadership in line with our strategy and our values
* Manage ARPRO production (quality, efficiency, issue analysis report)
* Motivate and make the people growing following Job ladder
* Promote ONE JSP and EMEA exchanges
* Make clear and brief report/recommendation
* Be a driving force to improve internal processes that will lead to more efficiency and flexibility
* Be actively involved in 5S and responsible for a safe and secure working environment

**Job Requirements**

_To be successful in the role you will have:_

* An open and positive mind
*  Excellent planning, organisational and analytical skills
* A proactive approach, business focus and drive
* Flexibility, self-confidence, persistence and initiative 
* The ability to deliver excellence and demand it of others
* The ability to make people grow
* A kodawari warrior mind
* A good English level

_Interested or you know someone? Please send your CV and cover letter in English to Cassandre Jardin – cassandre.jardin@jsp.com no later than 31.05.2019._
